text: Jeffrey Charles McCarthy (born October 16, 1954) is an American actor and director. McCarthy was born in Los Angeles and grew up in Santa Maria, California - growing up blocks away from the Pacific Conservatory of the Performing Arts, where he studied and performed for several seasons in the 1970s. He completed the masters program in acting at the American Conservatory Theater in San Francisco before becoming a company member. Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from California
title: Jeff McCarthy
